author: realbigsean
content:
Regarding whether to sign blobs in gossip -  from the call it sounded like one reason to still sign blobs is to avoid making `validate_blobs_sidecar` (validating commitments against blobs using the kzg proof) a gossip condition. 

Me and pawan are benchmarking with this library - https://github.com/crate-crypto/proto-danksharding-crypto - and seeing this  verification take 10-20 ms. Does this sound about right?
